meanings.definition: The act of expelling air forcibly from the mouth and nose due to irritation or congestion.
meanings.sent1: Sneezing can happen when something tickles your nose.
meanings.sent2: I heard someone sneezing loudly in the library.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing contest at the party was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her sneezing was like a burst of confetti, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sneezing echoed through the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: A sudden, involuntary expulsion of air from the nose and mouth caused by irritation or congestion.
meanings.sent1: After sneezing, she reached for a tissue to wipe her nose.
meanings.sent2: The sneezing fit caught him by surprise during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized sneezing of the puppies was adorable.
meanings.sent4: His sneezing was like a drumroll before the big announcement.
meanings.sent5: The force of his sneezing knocked the hat off his head.
